Package com.tdc.coin

Class CoinValidator

java.lang.Object
com.tdc.AbstractComponent<CoinValidatorObserver>
com.tdc.coin.AbstractCoinValidator
com.tdc.coin.CoinValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
IComponent<CoinValidatorObserver>, PassiveSource<Coin>, Sink<Coin>
public final class CoinValidator extends AbstractCoinValidator
Represents a component for optically and/or physically validating coins. Coins deemed valid are moved to storage; coins deemed invalid are ejected.
Author:
TDC, Inc.

  • Constructor Details

    • CoinValidator

      public CoinValidator(Currency currency, List<BigDecimal> coinDenominations)
      Creates a coin validator that recognizes coins of the specified denominations (i.e., values) and currency.
      Parameters:
      currency - The kind of currency to accept.
      coinDenominations - An array of the valid coin denominations (like $0.05, $0.10, etc.) to accept. Each value must be >0 and unique in this array.
      Throws:
      SimulationException - If either argument is null.
      SimulationException - If the denominations array does not contain at least one value.
      SimulationException - If any value in the denominations array is non-positive.
      SimulationException - If any value in the denominations array is non-unique.
